data.title: Steve Blake, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Steve Blake stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Steve Blake - Points

Steve Blake scores a career high 27 points (2002)

On December 08, 2002, Steve Blake set his career high in points in a NCAA game. That day he scored 27 points in Maryland Terrapins's road win against George Washington Colonials, 82-93. He also had 3 rebounds, 7 assists, 2 steals. He shot 5/5 from two, 5/7 from three, shooting at 83.3% from the field. He also shot 2/3 from the free-throw line.

Steve Blake - Rebounds

Steve Blake grabs a career high 10 rebounds (2004)

On March 23, 2004, Steve Blake tied his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 10 rebounds in Washington's road loss against Utah, 85-77. He also had 16 points, 2 assists, 1 steal.

Steve Blake - Assists

Steve Blake gives a career high 18 assists (2007)

On February 14, 2007, Steve Blake set his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 18 assists in Denver's road loss against Minnesota, 99-94. He also had 4 points, 5 rebounds, 1 steal.

Steve Blake - Steals

Steve Blake has a career high 7 steals (2014)

On April 16, 2014, Steve Blake set his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 7 steals in Golden State's road win against Denver, 112-116. He also had 8 points, 7 rebounds and 15 assists.

Steve Blake - Blocks

Steve Blake blocks a career high 2 shots (2005)

On November 04, 2005, Steve Blake tied his career high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 2 blocks in Portland's road loss against Denver, 107-68. He also had 2 points, 4 rebounds.

Steve Blake - Efficiency

Steve Blake records a career high 37 efficiency rating (2010)

On April 14, 2010, Steve Blake set his career high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 37 efficiency in LA Clippers's home win against LA Lakers, 107-91. He also had 23 points, 10 rebounds and 11 assists.
